languages.text: "Вы всегда знали, как заставить человека искренне сопереживать вашему делу, Лорд-капитан. Не сомневайтесь, моя организация изыщет самые интересные диковинки для обмена".

"You've always known how to make a person root wholeheartedly for your cause, Lord Captain. Rest assured, my organisation will find the rarest and most special items to offer for your trading consideration."
languages.original_text: "Вы всегда знали, как заставить человека искренне сопереживать вашему делу, Лорд-капитан. Не сомневайтесь, моя организация изыщет самые интересные диковинки для обмена".

traits.locale_text: "You've always known how to make a person root wholeheartedly for your cause, Lord Captain. Have no doubt that my organisation will find the rarest and most special items to offer for your trading consideration."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “您总是很清楚如何让别人全心全意地支持您的事业，舰长大人。请放心，我的组织一定会找到最稀有、最特别的物品，供您交易考虑。”
languages.original_text: "You've always known how to make a person root wholeheartedly for your cause, Lord Captain. Rest assured, my organisation will find the rarest and most special items to offer for your trading consideration."

traits.locale_text: “您总是很清楚如何让别人全心全意地支持您的事业，舰长大人。请放心，我的组织一定会找到最稀有、最特别的物品，供您交易考虑。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたはいつも、人々を心から応援させる方法を知っておられました。ご安心ください。私の組織は最も希少かつ特別な品々を見つけ、取引の際に提供いたします」
languages.original_text: "You've always known how to make a person root wholeheartedly for your cause, Lord Captain. Rest assured, my organisation will find the rarest and most special items to offer for your trading consideration."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたはいつも、人々を心から応援させる方法を知っておられました。ご安心ください。私の組織は最も希少かつ特別な品々を見つけ、取引の際に提供いたします」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Siempre ha sabido cómo hacer para que apoyen fervientemente su causa, Lord Capitán. Le aseguro que mi organización dará con los artículos más raros y especiales que ofrecerle».
languages.original_text: "You've always known how to make a person root wholeheartedly for your cause, Lord Captain. Rest assured, my organisation will find the rarest and most special items to offer for your trading consideration."

traits.locale_text: «Siempre ha sabido cómo hacer para que apoyen fervientemente su causa, Lord Capitán. Le aseguro que mi organización dará con los artículos más raros y especiales que ofrecerle».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ihr wusstet schon immer, wie man jemanden dazu bringt, Eure Sache mit ganzem Herzen zu unterstützen, Lord Captain. Ich versichere Euch, meine Organisation wird die seltensten und besten Waren finden und Euch anbieten."
languages.original_text: "You've always known how to make a person root wholeheartedly for your cause, Lord Captain. Rest assured, my organisation will find the rarest and most special items to offer for your trading consideration."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wusstet schon immer, wie man jemanden dazu bringt, Eure Sache mit ganzem Herzen zu unterstützen, Lord Captain. Ich versichere Euch, meine Organisation wird die seltensten und besten Waren finden und Euch anbieten."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Vous avez toujours su comment rallier les gens à votre cause, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. N'ayez crainte, mon organisation veillera à vous proposer les objets les plus rares le moment venu. »
languages.original_text: "You've always known how to make a person root wholeheartedly for your cause, Lord Captain. Rest assured, my organisation will find the rarest and most special items to offer for your trading consideration."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez toujours su comment rallier les gens à votre cause, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. N'ayez crainte, mon organisation veillera à vous proposer les objets les plus rares le moment venu. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Birinin davanızı canıgönülden desteklemesini nasıl sağlayacağınızı her zaman çok iyi bilmişsinizdir Lord Kaptan. Hiç merak etmeyin... Organizasyonum, almak isteyebileceğiniz özel ve son derece nadir ürünler bulacaktır."
languages.original_text: "You've always known how to make a person root wholeheartedly for your cause, Lord Captain. Rest assured, my organisation will find the rarest and most special items to offer for your trading consideration."

traits.locale_text: "Birinin davanızı canıgönülden desteklemesini nasıl sağlayacağınızı her zaman çok iyi bilmişsinizdir Lord Kaptan. Hiç merak etmeyin, organizasyonum sizin için, ticaret yapmayı düşüneceğiniz özel ve son derece nadir ürünler bulacaktır."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
